text:
[Verse]
Night falls on my street
Moonlight on my feet
Shadows come to play
Never want to stray

[Verse 2]
Stars up in the sky
Feel like I could fly
Darkness by my side
Nothing here to hide

[Chorus]
Dancing with shadows
Underneath the glow
Moving with the breeze
Flowing with ease

[Verse 3]
Quiet fills the air
No one else is there
Wind whispers my name
In this moonlit game

[Verse 4]
Steps in harmony
Just the night and me
Every shadow bends
Where the streetlight ends

[Chorus]
Dancing with shadows
Underneath the glow
Moving with the breeze
Flowing with ease
title: Dancing With Shadows
